creator: jadefire21@yahoo.com
text:
I have not been able to write a test that is easily able to reproduce this bug. 
However I have seen the bug when the same JSP page is request twice before it 
has been compiled at nearly the same time that the compiler throws a 
DuplicateClassDef exception.

This bug appear using JBuilder6 Ent as the starting agent. I am not sure if 
this is the cause.

creator: jadefire21@yahoo.com
text:
I forgot to include the st that I was getting...

creator: remm@apache.org
